txt.en: Attention weaponsmiths,\n\nWe can use throwing hatchets to augment and assist our provisioners in providing enough game to feed the Eglan-people. If you can craft these items, please deliver some to Léoflac at our encampment at Ost Guruth.
'These throwing hatchets will do nicely. With them, we will be able to hunt effectively throughout the Lone-lands and be able to feed all our people.\n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'

Throwing hatchets are a way that the Eglain can procure the game needed to feed the many mouths among them. They have asked that weaponsmiths assist them by crafting throwing hatchets to achieve this goal.
Deliver the Gondorian throwing hatchets to Léoflac

Craft three Gondorian throwing hatchets and deliver them to Léoflac at the Eglan-encampment at Ost Guruth.\n\nGondorian throwing hatchets will be used to assist the Eglan-provisioners in providing enough food for the entirety of their people.
